name: ROCKS - Luxurious Quaffing
description:
“ROCKS” are an exciting new premium designed liquor product. 

The stainless steel “ROCKS” are chilled in the freezer before being added to the beverage to control temperature between 15˚ and room temperature. The product adds a luxurious weight to the glass and will not over chill or dilute the beverage as ice does. “ROCKS” are an Australian designed and developed product. 

Each set of rocks contains 4 pieces. 

AU$29.95 plus postage.
